 Welcome to HathiTrust! 
     
 About  › Our Collaborative Programs 
 Our Collaborative Programs 
 
 
 
 
 In addition to its primary focus on the HathiTrust Digital Library, HathiTrust and its partner institutions collaborate on some major initiatives to improve access to and promote preservation of scholarly materials both digital and print, in a variety of formats. Learn more about: Copyright Review (CRMS)   Federal Documents Program Shared Print Program Other Projects and Grants
